category-def.name: RSE
category-def.label: Remote Systems Explorer (RSE)
category-def.description: This category contains the features of the Remote Systems Explorer (RSE).

category-def.name: RSE_Runtime
category-def.label: Remote Systems Explorer (RSE) - Runtime only
category-def.description: This category contains the features of the Remote Systems Explorer (RSE) - Runtime only. These features are included in the RSE SDK; use these instead of the SDK if you do not want to get developer documentation, or sources. Select one or more of the "Services" features you need, then choose "select required" to get the core.
